hotelchain

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a reservation made at a hotel. It contains information about who made this reservation, when and where. Implements Serializable so instances can be stored using the FileHandler class.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(int _guestID,
           java.lang.String _hotelName,
           int _roomNumber,
           java.util.Calendar resStartDate,
           java.util.Calendar resEndDate,
           boolean _bridalSuite,
           int resID)
        Constructs a new Reservation with given guest ID number, hotel name, room number, start and end dates and reservation ID.
        Parameters:
        _guestID - ID number of Guest this reservation was booked by.
        _hotelName - Name of hotel booked by this reservation.
        _roomNumber - Room number of Room booked by this reservation.
        resStartDate - Start date of this reservation.
        resEndDate - End date of this reservation.
        _bridalSuite - Indicates whether this reservation is for a bridal suite.
        resID - ID number of this reservation.
